trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Mankato
There was one other sighting in Mankato on or around March 24th 2011
divs: sighting details*(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). i was approached by this thing around 6:45 to 7pm. this is just a clip of the footage. i slowed it down, because it was pretty shakey, as i was sitting in the truck when the event occurred(no tripod). it is pretty clear that people don't know what to think of this, and turn to ridicule as a way of expression. the rest of this footage is quite shocking and shows the extent of the deception involved with this phenomenon. for me it is as simple as easy math, to explain this phenomenon. for others not so. i have been aware of this for some time, and have documented all phases of the aerial phenomenon that i am aware of. they are known for throwing curves though.
